data.message: Hi, how can we get in touch with someone at Facebook about adding a temporary profile photo we have created (using the Facebook temporary profile picture PSD file guide) to the 'causes' section for High Risk Hope for Prematurity Awareness month in November? We know it is not available to everyone yet but we are a wonderful trial group with 10K loyal followers who will be thrilled to use our temporary profile photo! Thank you for your help and consideration:)

replies.message: Hey there. Please reach out to our Facebook for Business team for questions about Pages and ads: http://bit.ly/2dPKyY8. -Hannah
Facebook we reached out to them yesterday through the contact us link and they were very polite but sent us to you (email below). Any other options?

Hi,

Thank you for contacting Facebook Ad Support. My name is Chad and I will be happy to assist you. I can understand how important it is to have your photos featured in the causes section.

You have a very worthy cause and I commend your business for the acts of kindness and generosity you provide. 

Unfortunately, we only handle the Advertisement department for support and I would submit a ticket possibly through your personal profile for recommendations on how to go about requesting becoming part of the  Causes section. 

I apologize for the inconvenience. 

If you have any further questions, don't hesitate to reply back and I will be happy to help. 

One last thing, if you could please help us improve by taking a few minutes to complete a brief survey about your experience with me.  You'll receive an email linking to our survey in the next few minutes. I appreciate your feedback, and thank you for contacting Facebook. 

Thanks,

Chad
Facebook Global Marketing Solutions
High Risk Hope Im not surprised its hard to get a hold of anyone at FB or Instagram apparently. For such a big company their support system is very very flawed.
Benjamin Knox thanks, any tips for us?! We are desparate!!

Hi there.  If you have any ideas you'd like to share with us, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2e2lrSc. 
You can learn more about raising awareness through your Page here: http://bit.ly/2e2kHfQ. -Joe
